description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5rsq1","text":"Reverse transcription (RT) is the process of turning ssDNA into cDNA using the reverse transcriptase enzyme. This protocol uses the RT reaction to turn ssRNA and dsRNA into ssDNA and is specifically used for virome analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
